scripts.duomo-dev: sass duomo.config.scss tmp/duomo.css --no-source-map && esbuild tmp/duomo.css --log-level=warning --outfile=www/duomo.css && rm -rf tmp
scripts.duomo-build: sass duomo.config.scss tmp/duomo.css --no-source-map && esbuild tmp/duomo.css --log-level=warning --minify --outfile=www/duomo.css && rm -rf tmp
